DOC.brief_summary: This is a non-interventional treatment Registry of Hereditary Angioedema (HAE) patients treated with C1 inhibitor, either plasma-derived (pdC1INH) or the recombinant human form (Ruconest), to observe adverse events and insufficient efficacy, and to assess the immunological profile following single and repeated treatment with Ruconest.
DOC.brief_title: C1 Inhibitor Registry in the Treatment of Hereditary Angioedema (HAE) Attacks
DOC.criteria: Decision to treat the HAE patient with C1 inhibitor (either Ruconest or pdC1INH) Patients must give written informed consent A diagnosis of acquired C1INH deficiency (AAE)
